mapper.select: SELECT b.user_id, u.nickname, SUM(benefit_money) AS benefit FROM torn_faction_oc_benefit b LEFT JOIN torn_user u ON u.deleted = 0 AND b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.deleted = 0 AND b.faction_id = #{factionId} AND b.oc_finish_time BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} GROUP BY b.user_id, u.nickname ORDER BY benefit DESC LIMIT 30;
